content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at position (10.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at position (13.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at position (16.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Wooden Chests at positions (8.5, -0.5), (17.5, -0.5), (19.5, -0.5), (20.5, -0.5), (8.5, 1.5), (17.5, 1.5), (19.5, 1.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (8.5, 0.5), (17.5, 0.5), (19.5, 0.5), (20.5, 0.5)

### Electricity Generator at position (-0.5, 17.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-0.5, 17.5)
- Boiler at position (-3.5, 22.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-7.5, 25.5)
- PipeGroup connecting these entities

### Research Lab
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab with research set to Electronics, located at an unspecified position

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors in Research Prerequisites
- Ensure all prerequisite technologies are researched before attempting to set a new research. For example, research Electronics before Automation-2.

### Errors Related to Fuel and Inventory Management
- Regularly check and refill fuel for entities such as Burner Mining Drills and Boilers to prevent interruptions in operations.
- Ensure chests connected to mining drills are not full to avoid halting resource extraction.

### Errors in Power and Fluid Connections
- Connect Steam Engines to the power network and ensure there is input liquid to generate electricity.
- Verify that all fluid connections are properly established to maintain functionality of entities like Boilers and Offshore Pumps.
